original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 18.24. Piṭṭhiduka, Hetuduka
analyzed: piṭṭhiduka hetuduka

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam hetum dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam hetum dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na hetu dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke

original: ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: ekam pe a vigate cattāri

original: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca nana dassanena pahātabbaḥ nana hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabbam hetum dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā … tīṇi. Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo
analyzed: hetu paccayā tīṇi na bhāvanāya pahātabbam hetum dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe

original: dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri

original: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam hetum dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam hetum dhammam paṭicca na na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha pañhe. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi sabbattha pañhe saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: cha, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: cha ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cha

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca nana dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhamma

original: paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi
